0101011101100100 1101000101100011 0 -> sum: 0010100011000111, cout: 1

1011101000001001 1010011111110010 0 -> sum: 0110000111111011, cout: 1
1010100111101101 1001110111100011 1 -> sum: 0100011111010001, cout: 1
1010010001111010 0011111111101010 1 -> sum: 1110010001100101, cout: 0
1111011100111110 1111001100111001 1 -> sum: 1110101001111000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
